API Documentation

ball-databind.jar 
Package Description
ball.databind
Data Binding Utilities.
ball.databind.ant
See org.apache.tools.ant.
ball.databind.ant.taskdefs
See org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.
ball.databind.entity
Abstract JSONEntity base class for JSONBean entities.
ball-http.jar 
Package Description
ball.http
See org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.
ball.http.annotation
Provides Annotation implementation classes.
ball.http.annotation.processing
Provides Processor implementation classes.
ball.http.ant
See org.apache.tools.ant.
ball.http.ant.taskdefs
See org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.
ball-spring.jar 
Package Description
ball.spring
Reusable Spring components.
ball.spring.dialect
Spring-Thymeleaf dialects.
ball.spring.jig
Classes for Spring server development.
ball.spring.jig.autoconfigure
Ball Spring Jig Auto Configuration Classes.
ball.spring.mysqld
Embedded MySQL server.
ball.spring.mysqld.autoconfigure
Ball Spring mysqld Auto Configuration Classes.
ball-upnp.jar 
Package Description
ball.upnp
Classes specific to Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) (moved to https://openconnectivity.org/developer/specifications/upnp-resources/upnp-developer-resources).
ball.upnp.annotation
Provides Annotation implementation classes.
ball.upnp.annotation.processing
Provides Processor implementation classes.
ball.upnp.ant
See org.apache.tools.ant.
ball.upnp.ant.taskdefs
See org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.
ball.upnp.ssdp
Classes specific to Simple Service Discovery Protocol 1.0 (SSDP).
ball-util.jar 
Package Description
ball.activation
Provides DataSource (and other javax.activation) implementation classes.
ball.annotation
Provides Annotation implementation classes.
ball.annotation.processing
Provides Processor implementation classes.
ball.beans
See java.beans.
ball.io
See java.io.
ball.lang
See java.lang.
ball.lang.reflect
See java.lang.reflect.
ball.swing
javax.swing implementation classes.
ball.swing.table
javax.swing.table implementation classes.
ball.text
Provides implementation classes for handling text.
ball.tools
Provides javax.tools support classes.
ball.tools.javac
Provides javac plug-ins.
ball.util
See java.util.
ball.util.ant
See org.apache.tools.ant.
ball.util.ant.taskdefs
See org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.
ball.util.ant.types
See org.apache.tools.ant.types.
ball.util.stream
See java.util.stream.
ball.xml
Classes for XML processing.
